Instructions on how to successfully take your Finger - Prick blood test ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌
Dear {{{Recipient.FirstName}}}
Thank you for your finger-prick blood test order.
Please note the following important instructions for taking and returning your sample:
We have placed your order and you should receive a finger-prick home testing kit in the coming days.
It is important that you take your blood sample on a Monday, Tuesday or Wednesday and send it back the same day, because the testing labs are closed on the weekend.
Failure to follow this advice will increase the likelihood of your blood sample failing, due to the blood being too old to analyse.
Here is a video that you might find useful for the blood test:
- How to take a finger prick blood test
https://youtu.be/0oVjzk-7vpE
If you have any questions, please contact bloods@optimale.co.uk or reply to this email.
If you haven't already shared them with us, it would also be good to hear about the symptoms which have led you to purchase this blood test.
Many thanks,
Optimale
Optimale Ltd, 71-75 Shelton Street, London, WC2H 9JQ, United Kingdom
